episode_summary: In this episode, Anna DeSimone discusses the persistent issue of mortgage discrimination and the homeownership gap. She emphasizes the role of REALTORS in educating clients and advocating for fair lending practices to close this gap. The conversation also highlights the importance of understanding the long-term benefits of home appreciation, even in the face of rising mortgage rates.
